errors.error_description: Added unnecessary 'pip install poetry' command in the basic installation section when poetry is not needed for regular installation
correction_candidates: Remove the 'pip install poetry' line from the installation section
Replace 'pip install poetry' with 'pip install --upgrade pip'
Move 'pip install poetry' to the developer instructions section
Change 'pip install poetry' to 'pip install setuptools'
errors.golden_answer: Remove the 'pip install poetry' line from the installation section

errors.error_description: In developer instructions, 'pip install .' is executed before 'poetry install', which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: Move 'pip install .' after 'poetry install' and 'pre-commit install'
Remove 'pip install .' from developer instructions entirely
Change the order to run 'poetry install' before 'pip install .'
errors.golden_answer: Change the order to run 'poetry install' before 'pip install .'
